entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of flurries after midnight. Becoming clear overnight. Risk of thundershowers early this evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 8 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 30%
